page.title: 06HENRYS HOUSE
page.content: I have lived at Orchard Cottage, Ellerton, all my life.It is quite an old house.It is built of brick and stone.On the roof there are orange- red tiles,a brick chimney stack and a television aerial which is broken.Our house has no dampcourse because it is old. Inside there are seven rooms.They are the living room,the kitchen,three bedrooms,a bathroom and Dad's office.In my Mum's bedroom there is a fire-place which has been blocked up. We have a coal fire which also heats the water and the radiators.Another radiator runs on calor gas. Dad built the porch,and he also made the garden shed. We used to have a spare bedroom,but Dad took it over for his collection of guns,knives and swords.
